recipe.name: Chicken Gorgonzola
recipe.preparation: Heat pan over medium heat and melt butter.  Add onions and sugar and cook until onions are well browned -- about 20 minutes.  Set aside.Marinate chicken and zucchini separately in 1 cup each herbed olive oil  Char-broil or grill chicken for 3-5 minutes per side or until done.For each chicken breast, arrange 3 slices zucchini and top with chicken breast.  Add 1/3 cup of caramelized onions and 1 1/2 oz Gorgonzola to each.  Bake at 325F for 3 minutes or until softened.Herbed oil:2 cups olive oil, heated to 325F.  Remove from heat and add 2 1/2 Tbl garlic, minced; 1 1/2 tbsp rosemary; 1 1/2 tbsp black peppercorns, cracked.  Cool and strain.
